Hiring Again: Rails Developers wanted

07 Apr 2009

We’ve been working for a while on our biggest project (Aviation industry related), and it’s keeping my team busy too much in the past few weeks, and they can’t seem to reach other tasks.
So, i decided to open a seperate development team to handle this project and i am looking for Rails developers to man it in the near future:

Job Requirements

  1. Rails 2.x experience (duh!).
  2. jQuery (mootools too would be nice).
  3. Since it’s an in-house job, you should be living around Fort Lauderdale, Florida.
  4. Proven experience and recommendations would be nice too.

Contact me via:

  • Twitter,
  • The #rubyonrails IRC channel on irc.freenode.net as eladmeidar.
  • or via my email address at my home page.

See ya!
